Shivah/Luzbel::

"I've told you that isn't good idea..." Said Shivah

"Come on..."replied Luzbel "He never knew that we... erm.. took 
holidays"

"He said Come back to BLacFortress and we'll come back to 
BlackFortress..."

"We have to...!!!!"

"WE DOOOO!!!" shouted impatient Shivah.

Both dragons wer arguin a large while they where in central Africa... 

"I can't stand you!!!!" shouted angry Shivah who took off and flew 
towards BlackFortress.

"If you like come back home is your trouble" shouted Luzbel and said 
to himself"I'm going to holidays"

Luzbel tookoff and went towards North America
